config.tweaked_anvils.title: Tweaked Anvils Configuration
config.tweaked_anvils.explanation.header: Configure the experience cost formulas for anvil operations.
config.tweaked_anvils.explanation.variab:
Available variables:
n1: Number of enchants on item 1
n2: Number of enchants on item 2
nf: Number of enchants on final item
p1: Enchantment points of item 1
p2: Enchantment points of item 2
pf: Final enchantment points
r: Repair amount
n: Is renamed (0 or 1)
w1: Work of item 1
w2: Work of item 2
w: Default work (max(w1, w2)).
config.tweaked_anvils.explanation.point_:
Enchantment point variables:
el: Enchantment level
em: Max enchantment level
ev: Rarity value.
config.tweaked_anvils.explanation.link_p: For a more detailed explanation, see: %s
config.tweaked_anvils.repairFormula.tool: Formula for calculating XP cost when repairing items.
config.tweaked_anvils.renameFormula.tool: Formula for calculating XP cost when renaming items (only).
config.tweaked_anvils.formula.invalid: Invalid formula! Please check syntax and variable names.
config.tweaked_anvils.enchantMergeSameFo: Enchant formula for merging enchants of the same items
Formula for calculating XP cost when merging enchantments on the same items.
config.tweaked_anvils.enchantApplyBookFo: Enchant formula for applying enchant with book
Formula for calculating XP cost when applying an enchanted book.
config.tweaked_anvils.enchantPointFormul: Formula for computing enchantment points. Variables: el, em, ev.
config.tweaked_anvils.evVeryRare.tooltip: Rarity multiplier for very rare enchantments.
config.tweaked_anvils.xp_cost_explanatio:
The above formulas calculate a number. In vanilla, the number would be a fixed number of levels and would not reflect xp scaling. This mod automatically assumes the number is raw xp, then calculates the appropriate level cost from the xp.
While the level cost will be based on raw xp, this mod does not apply the cost based on raw xp. For that, we recommend Tax Free Levels.
config.tweaked_anvils.calculateUsingXp: Calculate level cost using raw xp
config.tweaked_anvils.calculateUsingXp.t: This is recommended to be YES
config.tweaked_anvils.xpPerUnit.tooltip: The formulas are multiplied by this to get the actual raw xp
